name: Monkey Banana Wars
description:
Two monkeys fighting each other in a devastating thunderstorm with only some explosive bananas between them.

Being a remake of the old "Gorillas" this game was heavily pimped by the use of particle effects for rain and thunderstorm as well as with destructible Terrain.

This Game was written using C# and SFML.NET.

Visit us on our website for more great games!
